data.name: Showdown Party
data.detailed_description:
Multiplayer game for up to 8 players. Play in several boards with many minigames each!

Features:

Many boards with special mechanics.
Tons of minigames!
Pretty characters.
Up to 8 players multiplayer experience both online and local.

data.short_description: Multiplayer game for up to 8 players. Play in several boards with many minigames each!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, 8.1, 10
  • Processor: 2Cores 2.0 Ghz 64 bit CPU
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB Video RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Anything made in the last 5 years should do, really.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, 8.1, 10
  • Processor: 2Cores 3.0 Ghz 64 bit CPU
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB Video RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Anything made in the last 5 years should do, really.

release_date.date: Not late, not early. Precisely when it's time...
